questions.question_text:
An organization wants to build autoscaling web applications without having to manage application infrastructure

Which Google Cloud product should they use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Per Google docs, App Engine, allows for "freeing up your developers with zero server management and zero configuration deployments".

https://cloud.google.com/appengine

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

questions.question_text: What is an organization exclusively responsible for when they access an application through a software as a service (SaaS) model?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
In a SaaS model, the application and its underlying infrastructure are managed and maintained by the service provider. This includes the responsibility for system operability, server maintenance, network security, and other infrastructure-related tasks. The service provider ensures that the application is always available, secure, and up-to-date, and handles any issues or incidents that arise. However, the organization is responsible for maintaining their own content that is displayed through the application. This includes managing user accounts, data, and configurations, and ensuring that the content is accurate, up-to-date, and compliant with relevant laws and regulations.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.
It should be C, as per the question information has to be categorised from website's contact form which will be in the form of documented text data. This has nothing to do with Recommendations AI

Selected Answer: C
AutoML Natural Language: classify text, extract information, analyze sentiment, and understand customer feedback.

Recommendations AI: product recommendations based on user's past behaviour, preferences, and context.

So, it is C

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
C. AutoML Natural Language

Google Cloud AutoML Natural Language is a product that allows users to train custom machine learning models to perform natural language processing (NLP) tasks, such as text classification, sentiment analysis, and entity extraction. To train a model, users simply provide AutoML Natural Language with a dataset of labeled data.

Selected Answer: C
Natural Language

Selected Answer: C
https://cloud.google.com/natural-language/automl/docs

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer for sure

The Google Cloud product or service that the organization should use to train a custom machine learning model to categorize customer responses from their website's contact form is option C, AutoML Natural Language.

AutoML Natural Language is a Google Cloud service that enables organizations to train custom machine learning models to understand and categorize text. With AutoML Natural Language, the organization can easily create a custom model that can analyze customer responses and categorize them based on their content.

Selected Answer: C
I would go with C because in this situation, the ML model needs to infer from the text the customers write in the forms, so it needs to have a Natural Language Processing (NLP) capability, present on AutoML Natural Language.

Selected Answer: B
Per Google docs, Recommendations AI, "delivers highly personalized product recommendations at scale". Additionally, "Recommendations AI draws on that experience and expertise in machine learning to deliver personalized recommendations that suit each customer's tastes and preferences across all your touchpoints." 

https://cloud.google.com/recommendations

questions.question_text:
An organization needs to train a custom machine learning model to categorize customer responses from their website's contact form.

Which Google Cloud product or service should the organization use?
Which cybersecurity threat can lead to information being stolen or damaged without a user ever being aware?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
A malware attack is a type of cyber attack in which malicious software is used to gain unauthorized access to a system, steal information, or cause damage. Unlike other types of attacks, such as ransomware or incomplete data input, a user may not be aware that their system has been compromised.
Answer is B - Keywords: Without user being aware... Ransomware attack would mean that users would be aware.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

choices.A: Customers expect information to be easily accessible on any device.
choices.C: Developers can apply increased data security on a mobile app.
choices.D: Developers can run different versions of the service to test features only through a mobile app.
choices.B: Customers expect mobile-only access to information in the cloud era

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: A
The most likely reason that prompted the organization to create a mobile app for their customer-facing service is that customers expect information to be easily accessible on any device, as option A suggests.

Selected Answer: A
the decision to create a mobile app for a customer-facing service is usually prompted by the need to provide customers with easy and convenient access to information and services on any device, rather than other technical reasons such as security or testing.

questions.question_text:
An organization has decided to create a mobile app for their customer-facing service.

What may have prompted this business decision?
